name: Space Cowboy (itch)
description:
Space Cowboy is a game about a guy  shooting some stuff at taget practice, and well that escalated quickly, suddenly the cows around you are sucked up in to a UFO and the aliens up in that ufo  will do all kinds of human tests you. fight you'r way through puzzels and alien monsters. on a cool adventure 

the game was made by one guy in a few days for the UE4 jam
